name: Better Served World
overview:
Better Served World is focused on investing in, developing and implementing the next generation of payment products and services in the US and internationally. Highlights include:

IPKOCARD www.ipkocard.com

Better Served World developed and launched the first prepaid Visa Program in the Balkans. Through a partnership with a leading Kosovo mobile operator BSW worked with the Kosovar government, local banks, processors and retail stores to introduce an innovative international prepaid program.

AFL-CIO Prepaid Card Program www.myunionprepaid.com

Better Served World developed a payments program for the AFL-CIO that will be used by 30+ unions in the United States. The mission was to provide value for union members as well as unify and connect union membership.
